source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a static, wide shot of the entrance to the Hotel Provincial. The video is a completely still scenery shot. There is no movement from the camera or any subjects within the frame.

source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This is a wide shot of the entrance to the Hotel Provincial. The video features a mostly still scenery shot, with slight shakiness in the camera. The flames within the two gas lamp-style lanterns in the frame are continuously flickering.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a wide shot of the entrance to the Hotel Provincial. The video features a mostly still scenery shot, with slight shakiness in the camera. The flames within the two gas lamp-style lanterns in the frame are continuously flickering.

generated_critique: The caption should be revised to be more concise by removing the introductory sentence and the meta-commentary. The first sentence, "This is a wide shot of the entrance to the Hotel Provincial," is introductory and should be deleted. The phrase "The video features" is also unnecessary. The description should focus directly on the motion within the frame, combining the accurate observations about the camera and the flames into a single, direct statement.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: The camera holds a static, wide shot of the entrance to the Hotel Provincial, where the only movement is the flickering of the flames in the two gas lamps flanking the doorway.
